mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_id=#{param1} AND member_pw=#{param2}

SELECT m.member_name, m.member_id, m.member_nickName, m.member_gender, m.member_pw, m.member_email, m.member_phone, m.member_roadAddr, m.member_parcelAddr, m.member_detailAddr, (SELECT s2.subsType from subs s LEFT JOIN substype s2 on s.subsType_code =s2.subsType_code where member_idx =(SELECT m.member_idx from member m where member_id=#{id})) as subsType FROM member m LEFT JOIN subs s ON m.member_idx=s.member_idx where member_id =#{id};
